title: Zeity Zeity Boss Trends 4/8: Derek Chauvin, South Carolina, Outkast v Beatles, Sony x Netflix
itunes:title: Zeity Zeity Boss Trends 4/8: Derek Chauvin, South Carolina, Outkast v Beatles, Sony x Netflix
description:
On this edition of Zeity Zeity Boss Trends Jack and Miles discuss the Derek Chauvin trial, the South Carolina mass shooting, Outkast > Beatles, and Sony signing with Netflix.
